segment.source: High Level Architecture for App-V 5.0
segment.target: High Level Architecture for App-V 5.0

segment.source: High Level Architecture for App-V 5.0
segment.target: High Level Architecture for App-V 5.0

segment.source: High Level Architecture for App-V 5.0
segment.target: High Level Architecture for App-V 5.0

segment.source: Use the following information to help you simplify you Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.0 deployment.
segment.target: Use the following information to help you simplify you Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.0 deployment.

segment.source: Architecture Overview
segment.target: Architecture Overview

segment.source: A typical App-V 5.0 implementation consists of the following elements.
segment.target: A typical App-V 5.0 implementation consists of the following elements.

segment.source: Element
segment.target: Element

segment.source: More information
segment.target: More information

segment.source: App-V 5.0 Management Server
segment.target: App-V 5.0 Management Server

segment.source: The App-V 5.0 Management server provides overall management functionality for the App-V 5.0 infrastructure.
segment.target: The App-V 5.0 Management server provides overall management functionality for the App-V 5.0 infrastructure.

segment.source: Additionally, you can install more than one instance of the management server in your environment which provides the following benefits:
segment.target: Additionally, you can install more than one instance of the management server in your environment which provides the following benefits:

segment.source: Fault Tolerance and High Availability – Installing and configuring the App-V 5.0 Management server on two separate computers can help in situations when one of the servers is unavailable or offline.
segment.target: Fault Tolerance and High Availability – Installing and configuring the App-V 5.0 Management server on two separate computers can help in situations when one of the servers is unavailable or offline.

segment.source: You can also help increase App-V 5.0 availability by installing the Management server on multiple computers.
segment.target: You can also help increase App-V 5.0 availability by installing the Management server on multiple computers.

segment.source: In this scenario, a network load balancer should also be considered so that server requests are balanced.
segment.target: In this scenario, a network load balancer should also be considered so that server requests are balanced.

segment.source: Scalability – You can add additional management servers as necessary to support a high load, for example you can install multiple servers behind a load balancer.
segment.target: Scalability – You can add additional management servers as necessary to support a high load, for example you can install multiple servers behind a load balancer.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 Publishing Server
segment.target: App-V 5.0 Publishing Server

segment.source: The App-V 5.0 publishing server provides functionality for virtual application hosting and streaming.
segment.target: The App-V 5.0 publishing server provides functionality for virtual application hosting and streaming.

segment.source: The publishing server does not require a database connection and supports the following protocols:
segment.target: The publishing server does not require a database connection and supports the following protocols:

segment.source: HTTP, and HTTPS
segment.target: HTTP, and HTTPS

segment.source: You can also help increase App-V 5.0 availability by installing the Publishing server on multiple computers.
segment.target: You can also help increase App-V 5.0 availability by installing the Publishing server on multiple computers.

segment.source: A network load balancer should also be considered so that server requests are balanced.
segment.target: A network load balancer should also be considered so that server requests are balanced.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 Reporting Server
segment.target: App-V 5.0 Reporting Server

segment.source: The App-V 5.0 Reporting server enables authorized users to run and view existing App-V 5.0 reports and ad hoc reports that can help them manage the App-V 5.0 infrastructure.
segment.target: The App-V 5.0 Reporting server enables authorized users to run and view existing App-V 5.0 reports and ad hoc reports that can help them manage the App-V 5.0 infrastructure.

segment.source: The Reporting server requires a connection to the App-V 5.0 reporting database.
segment.target: The Reporting server requires a connection to the App-V 5.0 reporting database.

segment.source: You can also help increase App-V 5.0 availability by installing the Reporting server on multiple computers.
segment.target: You can also help increase App-V 5.0 availability by installing the Reporting server on multiple computers.

segment.source: A network load balancer should also be considered so that server requests are balanced.
segment.target: A network load balancer should also be considered so that server requests are balanced.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 Client
segment.target: App-V 5.0 Client

segment.source: The App-V 5.0 client enables packages created using App-V 5.0 to run on target computers.
segment.target: The App-V 5.0 client enables packages created using App-V 5.0 to run on target computers.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you are using App-V 5.0 with Electronic Software Distribution (ESD) you are not required to use the App-V 5.0 Management server, however you can still utilize the reporting and streaming functionality of App-V 5.0.
segment.target: If you are using App-V 5.0 with Electronic Software Distribution (ESD) you are not required to use the App-V 5.0 Management server, however you can still utilize the reporting and streaming functionality of App-V 5.0.

segment.target: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
